The truck stopped in front of the green rear security door. The .40 cal machine gun opened a volley upon the door. The hail of led penetraited through the aluminium and smashed the lock beyond recognition. The two men in the front jumped out of the beaten truck cab. Both carried AK-47s with 30 round banana clips with gas masks. One had very old and shifty eyes, the kind of a war veteren that had been in the feild too long. The other man was very young and green. The older man pulled open the remains of the dorr while the other covered the hallway inside. White light, white walls, and a white tile floor almost blinded the men. Both of them rushed down the hallway."We need lab 12," belted the older man. "Were at lab 15 now," screamed the other. As they ran two security gaurds rounded the corner.

The laboratorys were quiet at this time of night. All research personnell has gone home, the lab animals are asleep, and all thats left is the security gaurds watching moniters and making their rounds. The perfect time to strike. This time of year was cold in Germany. "There is usually snow on the ground, but it has ben unseasonably warm," though Klaus as he looked over his load drop off schedual. He was a lone gaurd at the gate of United Deutschland Labs, Incorporated. Off in the distance the lights of a small truck peirced the black veil of the forest that surrounded the labs. "Theres no material drops tonight,"thought Klaus. Klaus was a man in his late fourties, with brown withering hair and a moustache. Time was hard on this man, but tonight would be harder. The roar of the truck's enigine cam blasting up the drive. "This truck isnt going to stop,". Klaus frantically pushed the gate close button, and the metal fencing gate closed. The truck came closer. There were two people in the back of the truck and two in the cab. "Stop or I will be force to fire," Klaus screamed as he drew his revolver. The truck flashed their high beams which momentairly blinded the fourty-something old man. Then the sounds of the .40 cal machinegun in the bed of the truck rang out and sent the fealing of searing flesh and penetraition through the security gaurd. The gaurds body fell to the ground in a fleshy plop. Just in time to escape the bumper of the red truck as it smashed into the gate just beyond the body.
